Package org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.singleobjective.evolutionstrategy

Class EvolutionStrategyBuilder<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.singleobjective.evolutionstrategy.EvolutionStrategyBuilder<S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlgorithmBuilder<Algorithm<S>>
public class EvolutionStrategyBuilder<S extends Solution<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AlgorithmBuilder<Algorithm<S>>
Class implementing a (mu , lambda) Evolution Strategy (lambda must be divisible by mu)
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro
